publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers

publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers

In his latest novel One, phenomenally bestselling author Richard Bach

Thirteen-year-old Carrie uses a legal technicality to seize control of

Though suspected witch-neighbor Mrs. Tuggle has died, her glass eye

book_title: The Boy Who Owned the School

Jacob Freisten, often in a fog, tries to ease through high school

After Billy wins $410,000 in the lottery, his friends claim that he

Matthew's family's move from New York to Ohio is difficult

book_title: A Dream of Queens and Castles

Carmen, a little girl, finds a way to make a giant, smelly monster

book_title: The War Began at Supper: Letters to Miss Loria
Summary:
Students in Mrs. Clark's class write to their former student

book_title: Story of Laura Ingalls Wilder : Pioneer Girl
Summary:
A biography of the author of the beloved "Little House"

Relates what happened when an evil sea captain banished the letter O

book_title: The Cat Who Wished to Be a Man
Summary:

book_title: Full House Way to Go, Chipmunk Cheeks

Ten-year-old Billie, a Seminole Indian, is caught between the cultures

book_title: The Summer I Shrank My Grandmother
Summary:
Thrilled when she discovers an old chemistry set in her

book_title: The Boy With the Helium Head
Summary:
A young boy has unusual experiences after leaving the doctor's

Nine-year-old Austin discovers a new friend in his grandmother the

The diabolical Arawn's army grows every day, and his terrible

Ready for romance, thirteen-year-old Anastasia answers an ad in the

Planning their trick-or-treating route in order to obtain the highest

Beezus' biggest problem is her 4-year-old sister Ramona. Even
though Beezus knows sisters are supposed to love each other, with a
sister like Ramona, it seems impossible.

Beezus' biggest problem is her 4-year-old sister Ramona. Even
though Beezus knows sisters are supposed to love each other, with a
sister like Ramona, it seems impossible.

Donkey, Crow, and Rabbit join forces to prevent Fox from swindling

book_title: The Blossoms Meet the Vulture Lady
Summary:

book_title: The Book of Three (Chronicles of Prydain (Paperback))

book_title: The Story of Daniel Boone, Wilderness Explorer (A Dell Yearling Biography)

Americans

When her mother becomes ill, Isabel, a Mayan girl living in

Because of his success surviving alone in the wilderness for fifty-
four days, fifteen-year-old Brian, profoundly changed by his time in

"They are the first, but more are on the way," he says.

Undaunted by his second stint in the seventh-grade, Arnold continues

A mad scientist tries to use a new fertilizer to turn people into

When klutzy eleven-year-old Henry finds that his broken arm has

"Common Core Classroom Collections include a mix of titles

A gift of a toy castle, complete with silver knight, introduces

Entering her teens and finding herself declared the "woman of the

A girl and her family take in a baby named Sophie, raising her,

Twelve-year-old Elyse's plan to write an award-winning novel

When his parents call off the family vacation and enroll their son in

A twelve-year-old white boy , adopted and raised by Mohicans in the

Grieving for their dead mother, twelve-year-old James and his younger

Relates the fortunes of three adopted sisters who take dancing and

Three young people from different times, each with unique abilities,

When everyone in his world seems to turn against him at once,

Life becomes very complicated when Melissa and her best friend, Chloe,

"Death she'll bring you", says the gentleman.

Donation.
